text: Athaba se byaktira mata, ye emana eka janamata atikrama karechila ya tara chadera upara theke bidhbasta chila. Se balala, ‘mrtyura para kibhabe allah‌ eke jibita karabena? Tarapara allah‌ eke sata bachara mrta rakhalena. Pare take punarjibita karalena. Allah‌ balalena, ‘tumi katakala abasthana karale?’ Se balala, ‘ekadina ba ekadinera'o kichu kama abasthana karechi'. Tini balalena, baram tumi ekasata bachara abasthana karecha. Sutaram tumi tomara khadyasamagri o paniya bastura dike laksya kara, segulo abikrta rayeche ebam laksya kara tomara gadhatira dike. Ara yate amara tomake banabo manusera jan'ya nidarsana sbarupa. Ara asthigulora dike laksa karo; kibhabe seguloke sanyojita kari ebam gosata dbara dheke de'i.’ Atahpara yakhana tara nikata spasta hala takhana se balala, ‘ami jani niscaya'i allah‌ sabakichura upara ksamatabana’
